sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

spells.description:
Equip: When you enter combat, gain 1 Dormant Gemstone per socketed gem.

Whenever you heal an ally, bestow upon them 1 Empowered Gemstone to increase the potency of one of their socketed gems by 141 for 20 sec. When their gemstone becomes dormant, it is returned to you.

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 582,463.
Set: Holy Word: Serenity and Holy Word: Sanctify apply Insurance! for 10 sec to one target while Apotheosis is active. Your healing is increased by 1% for each Insurance! active on allies.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Bask a single friendly target in the censer's glow, applying a shield that absorbs up to 949,948 damage for 15 sec. (1 Min Cooldown)

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,755 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 204 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
Use: Increase movement speed by 150% and allow you to skim over water, rapidly diminishing over 1 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Selfless Wings of the Ascended

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
Use: Teleports the caster to the Argent Tournament Grounds. (30 Min Cooldown)
